# isLocalToneMapSupported

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates if the current image supports local tone curve adjustments.

## Declaration

```swift
var isLocalToneMapSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], you can adjust the amount of local tone curve to apply to the image by setting [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIRAWFilter/localToneMapAmount].

## Inspecting supported camera models, decoders, and filters

- **supportedCameraModels**: An array containing the names of all supported camera models.
- **supportedDecoderVersions**: An array of all supported decoder versions for the given image type.
- **CIRAWDecoderVersion**
- **isColorNoiseReductionSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if the current image supports color noise reduction adjustments.
- **isContrastSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if the current image supports contrast adjustments.
- **isDetailSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if the current image supports detail enhancement adjustments.
- **isLensCorrectionSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if you can enable lens correction for the current image.
- **isLuminanceNoiseReductionSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if the current image supports luminance noise reduction adjustments.
- **isMoireReductionSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if the current image supports moire artifact reduction adjustments.
- **isSharpnessSupported**: A Boolean that indicates if the current image supports sharpness adjustments.
- **nativeSize**: The full native size of the unscaled image.
